title: Biden’s Speech WORSE Than Hillary’s ‘Basket of Deplorables’ | 9/2/22
description:
Filling in for Glenn, Pat and Stu discuss the Left’s absurd campaign strategy of making everything worse, then bragging about any slight progress. Where do Republicans currently stand in the 2022 midterms? Pat and Stu critique what might be the worst, most divisive speech in President Biden’s career. The guys explain the importance of stage and set design, as many critiqued the demonic appearance of Biden’s latest speech. Biden claimed Republicans are election deniers, but how often have Democrats refused to accept an election outcome? Stu and Pat figure out whether Biden has cured cancer or not. The guys break down a few midterm races, including Arizona gubernatorial candidate Kari Lake and Pennsylvania Senate candidate Dr. Oz. Why has the Left doubled down on forcing drag shows and transgenderism on children?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
